Issue.creator: ozheregelya
Issue.summary: "abbr" parameter in "new identifier" command is recognized as identifier
Issue.description: help new identifier new identifier -------------- title: Creates new Identifier usage: new identifier |abbr|crypto with seed as note: crypto = cryptographic identifier, abbr = abbreviated verkey example(s): new identifier new identifier abbr new identifier 4QxzWk3ajdnEA37NdNU5Kt new identifier with seed aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa new identifier abbr with seed aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa new identifier 4QxzWk3ajdnEA37NdNU5Kt with seed aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa sovrin@test> new identifier abbr Identifier created in keyring Default-dd49d5 New identifier is abbr New verification key is EQBJ8w79aQbiC3LtGoNWB5NoZ9dDUVceiCGp5BTYMDJo Current identifier set to abbr {code} *Expected Results:* abbr parameter should work or it should be removed from help. >
